pkgmetadata.longdescription: Piecewise Constant Plus Smooth Regression // Allows for nonparametric regression where one assumes that the signal is given by the sum of a piecewise constant function and a smooth function. More precisely, it implements the estimator PCpluS (piecewise constant plus smooth regression estimator) from Pein and Shah (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2112.03878.
